entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 33 with temperature rising to minus 26 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Blowing snow at times overnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 33 with temperature rising to minus 26 by morning. Wind chill minus 46 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Becoming sunny in the afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the morning. High minus 26. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind light except northeast 50 km/h at times overnight. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 39 in the evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
